resources.string: Wash the floor – also underneath boxes and waste bins
Empty the vacuum cleaner and put in a new “dust bag”
Clean the ovens and the stove. Also clean the racks and the drawer underneath the oven.
All food without a name on it has to be thrown away, or the owner has to be found.
Empty and clean all the kitchen shelves, drawers and cabinets
Tidy up the storage room (it’s the small room with the drying racks and the electrical fuse box)
Clean the cooker hoot and the filters
Dust the kitchen (windowsill, wooden strips, loudspeakers, lamps and above the kitchen cabinets)
Clean the room with the all the refrigerators
Clean the shared refrigerator and the room
Clean the tables and clear/throw away everything except todays newspaper
Descale the water boiler and coffee maker
Throw paper and bottles in the container at the main entrance. Get rid of the pant and use the money for bullet 13. And 14. Put the money leftover in the metalbowl.
Clean the kitchen cabinets under the sinks and the cabinet doors around the waste bin (remember to clean the big white bins under the shelf)
Do the dishes or find the owner
Clean the toaster, sandwich toaster and microwave
Wash the dishcloths, floor cloths, towels, tea towels and pot holders (wash on 90⁰ without fabric softener)
Pick up waste bags, light bulbs and fuses at the caretaker (if any of these are missing)
Wash the white kitchen tiles and the pan rack
Buy spices if needed (salt, pepper, garlic, etc)
Buy more soap etc if needed in the kithen
903 (Jesper) must be informed when finished or you will be cleaning again the following week.
Are you sure you yo delete file?
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to delete account for good?

On this page you can get an overview of all the planned cleanings as well as create new ones or edit the existings ones. Click on the details icon, to go to the details page. Here you are shown the tasks of the cleaning as well as who is cleaning, date and wheter is has been checked.

On this page you can get an overview of all the planned foodclubs as well as create new ones or edit the existings ones. Click on the details icon, to go to the details page. Here you can see who is cooking, what they are cooking, diets of participant and the date.

On this page you can read all the agreed upon rules, these rules are taken from a google docs in the kitchen drive, and should be edited there. To change the rules, this needs to be discussed at a kitchen meeting.

On this page you can get an overview of all the residents. Here you can see photos, birthdays and diets of the people living at the kitchen. Click on the arrow to expand the resident view and see the details of the chosen resident.

On this page you can view and add topic you would like to dicuss on the next kitchen meeting. Click the X to delte a topic, the arrow to show a desription or add to create a new one. This page is not done, and will be exteended with summary of the meetings as well as overview of pcomming meetings and participants.
On this page you can get an overview of all the grocery what needs to be bought. Here you can add items to the list just click the + button. Click the X to remove an item.
On this page you can get an overview of all the grocery what needs to be bought. Here you can add items to the list just click the + button. Click the X to remove an item.
On this page you can get an overview of all the kitchen documents. Most importantly, you will have easy acces to the meeting agendas. just click on a file in the list.
